documentation.text: @notice Query the amount of tokens one would receive for an amount of ETH

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "distribution has exceeded max exchange rate"

arguments.value: distribution has exceeded max exchange rate

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "distribution has exceeded max exchange rate"

getAmountForDeposit(uint256).notice: Query the amount of tokens one would receive for an amount of ETH

returns._0: returns a default minimum amount of CNC token to be received for a given ETH amount this will compute an amount with a single tranch devation

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
